meanings.definition: A privilege or right granted by a government or ruler to an individual or group.
meanings.sent1: The king bestowed special francises upon his loyal subjects.
meanings.sent2: Citizens cherish their voting francises in a democracy.
meanings.sent3: Receiving a francis to skip the line at the amusement park made everyone jealous.
meanings.sent4: The exclusive club membership felt like a francis to enter a secret world.
meanings.sent5: Winning the contest felt like a golden francis to meet a celebrity.
